radiographic_examinations.findings: Significant narrowing of the spinal canal at the L3 and L4 levels.
Cortical thickening in the midshafts of both femurs, more pronounced in the lateral cortex.
Decreased edema at the fracture sites with faint cortical bridging.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Improvement noted at 6 months after starting teriparatide.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Complete healing of both atypical fractures.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Healing established after 1 year of teriparatide treatment.
